column5: My place is close to Nothing, We are located nine mile east of Conroe Tx in Montgomery county, ne to the Sam Houston National forest. If you are looking to relax, need a little peace and quiet, take the kids on a weekend outing, or just need a nice clean place to stay in the area then Pine Island Farm is for you. .
